name: The Slime Adventure
description:
Remake of my very first game TheLonelySlimeAdventure that I made for GMTK game jam in 2019. I'm working on this game for 3 - 4 months I don't know. Game has first world and few levels already. It has some lacks for example narrator that will comment how you play, music and sounds are also missing.

I will try push new update in every few days. I hope you will enjoy The Slime Adventure and plz don't play The Lonely Slime Adventure  it's kinda trash.
